prompt.name: Search for a Specific Movie
prompt.instruction: go to https://archive.org/details/moviesandfilms and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for a specific movie and verifies the result.

expected.outcome: The search results page displays 'Kagemusha'.

prompt.name: Complex Search and Filter Workflow
prompt.instruction: go to https://archive.org/details/moviesandfilms and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User performs a search, applies multiple filters, sorts the results, and then views a movie.

action: Click on the search bar in the main page
Type `silent film` into the search bar
Press Enter
Click `Filters` on the left sidebar to open the Filters dropdown menu
On the left sidebar, under `Year`, click on `1909`
Wait for the page to load
On the left sidebar, under `Subject`, click `D.W. Griffith`
Click on the `Title` button next to `Sort by:`
Click on the title of the first movie in the results
Verify the movie page loads and the title is correct
Click the play button on the video player to start the movie

expected.outcome: A silent film from 1909, directed by D.W. Griffith, sorted by alphabetical order, is successfully played.

prompt.name: Explore and Watch a Feature in a Specific Collection
prompt.instruction: go to https://archive.org/details/moviesandfilms and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to a specific collection, opens a sub-collection, sorts, and then watches a film.

action: Click `Filters` on the left sidebar to open the Filters dropdown menu
Click on `collection` under `Media Type` on the left sidebar
Click on the `Feature Films` collection
Click on the `Film Noir` sub-collection
Click on the `Weekly views` button to open a dropdown menu
Click on `All-time views` from the dropdown menu
Wait for the page to load
Click on the title of the first movie in the results
Wait for the page to load
Click the play button on the video player
Click on the fullscreen icon the in the video player controls

expected.outcome: The most viewed Film Noir movie is playing in fullscreen.

prompt.name: Find and View a Specific Director's Work
prompt.instruction: go to https://archive.org/details/moviesandfilms and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for a director, filters results, and examines the movie's metadata.

action: Click on the search bar in the main page
Type `Alfred Hitchcock` into the search bar
Press Enter
Click `Filters` on the left sidebar to open the Filters dropdown menu
Click on `1934` under `Year` on the left sidebar
Click on the movie `The Man Who Knew Too Much (1934)`
Scroll down to the movie information and verify it is by `Alfred Hitchcock`
Scroll up to the top of the page
Click the play button on the video player
Pause the movie after 10 seconds by clicking on the pause button in the video player controls
Mute the audio by clicking on the volume icon in the video player controls

expected.outcome: The movie 'The Man Who Knew Too Much', directed by Alfred Hitchcock, is paused and muted.

prompt.name: Explore Colorized Movies and Share
prompt.instruction: go to https://archive.org/details/moviesandfilms and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores the Colorized Movies collection and finds the share options.

action: Click on `Colorized Movies` in the main page
Click `Filters` on the left sidebar to open the Filters dropdown menu
Scroll down to the `Subject` section on the left sidebar and click `science fiction`
Click on the `Date Published` button on the main page
Wait for the page to load
Click on the first film in the results
Click the play button on the video player

Verify that sharing options (e.g., for Facebook, Twitter) are visible.

expected.outcome: An old, colorized, science fiction film is playing, and the share options are visible.

prompt.name: Investigate Movie Download Options
prompt.instruction: go to https://archive.org/details/moviesandfilms and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds a movie and investigates the different download formats available.

action: Click on the search bar in the main page
Type `Reefer Madness` into the search bar
Press Enter
Click on the `Reefer Madness` link to go to its page
Scroll down to the `DOWNLOAD OPTIONS` section
Verify that multiple download formats are listed (e.g., `512KB MPEG4`, `H.264`, `OGG VIDEO`)

prompt.name: Playback Speed and Subtitles Test
prompt.instruction: go to https://archive.org/details/moviesandfilms and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User plays a movie, changes the playback speed, and enables subtitles.

action: Click on the search bar in the main page
Type `Killers From Space` into the search bar
Press Enter
Click on the `Killers From Space` link from the search results
Wait for the page to load
Click the play button on the video player
Click on the settings gear icon in the video player controls to open the settings menu
Click on the playback rates icon on the top of the settings menu to open the playback rates section
Click on `1.25x` in the playback rates section of the settings menu
Click on the CC icon to open the subtitles menu
Click on `asr` to enable subtitles
Verify the movie is playing faster and with subtitles
Click on the settings gear icon in the video player controls to open the settings menu
Click on the playback rates icon on the top of the settings menu to open the playback rates section
Click on `1x` in the playback rates section of the settings menu

expected.outcome: The user is able to control the playback speed and subtitles for 'Killers From Space'.
